creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: a woman in a blue and gold kimono with various flowers and red edging looks over her left shoulder while fanning herself with a partially open hand fan; her teeth are blackened and she has two black dots on her forehead
markings: Right side, lower half of image, red stamp, and red seal
signed: Right side, lower half of image, signature in black ink
title: Standing Beauty
